description: Airing on Wednesday, January 28, 2015: First up on today's show, we'll talk to Rainey Reitman, director of the activism team at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, about EFF’s plan to stop Mass Surveillance. Plus, we'll also speak with Matt Novak, author of Gizmodo’s Paleofuture blog, about how Back to the Future Part II imagined the future of communication.

title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, January 28, 2015
